config.cs.enabled.desc: Enable or disable the custom scoreboard
config.cs.appearance.desc: Edit this list to change the order of appearance of the scoreboard.
config.cs.events.desc: Edit this list to change the order of appearance of the events.
config.cs.title_options.desc: Edit the title of the scoreboard.
config.cs.footer_options.desc: Edit the footer of the scoreboard.
config.cs.number_format.desc: Choose the format of the numbers in the scoreboard.
config.cs.number_display_format.desc: Choose the format numbers with their prefix are displayed in the scoreboard.
config.cs.vertical_alignment.desc: Choose the vertical alignment of the scoreboard.
config.cs.horizontal_alignment.desc: Choose the horizontal alignment of the scoreboard.
config.cs.hide_hypixel.desc: Enable or disable the Hypixel scoreboard.
config.cs.text_shadow.desc: Enable or disable the text shadow on the scoreboard.
config.cs.title_footer.alignment.desc: Choose the alignment of this element.
config.cs.title_footer.use_custom_text.d: Enable or disable custom text for this element.
config.cs.title_footer.custom_text.desc: Edit the custom text for this element. Use && for colors and \n for new line
config.cs.background.enabled.desc: Enable or disable the background of the scoreboard.
config.cs.background.color.desc: Choose the color of the background.
config.cs.background.padding.desc: Choose the padding of the background.
config.cs.background.margin.desc: Choose the margin between the scoreboard and the screen border.
config.cs.background.radius.desc: Choose the radius of the rounded corner of the background.
config.cs.lines.bits_available.desc: Show your available bits on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.colored_month.desc: Show the month in color on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.profile_name.desc: Show your profile name on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.mayor_time.desc: Show the time till the next mayor election on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.mayor_perks.desc: Show the perks of the mayor on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.mayor_minister.desc: Show the minister on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.all_events.desc: Show all events instead of the first one. Uses the "Events Priority" list.
config.cs.lines.hypixel_title.desc: Use Hypixel's Scoreboard Title. Â§cWill override the Custom Title if enabled.
config.cs.lines.party_everywhere.desc: Show the party on every Island instead of just Glacite Tunnels, Dungeon Hub and Crimson Isle.
config.cs.lines.max_party.desc: Show the max party size on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.party_leader.desc: Show the party leader on the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.separators_start_end: Hide Separators at Start and End
config.cs.lines.separators_start_end.des: Hide the separators at the start and end of the scoreboard.
config.cs.lines.color_arrow.desc: Color the Arrow Line based on the amount of arrows left.
config.cs.lines.arrow_display.desc: Choose the display type of the arrows.
config.cs.lines.piggy.desc: Use "Piggy" instead of "Purse" as your Purse prefix when a piggy bank is active.
config.cs.lines.pet_max.desc:
Show "Max" when the pet is at max level.
When disabled, the level will be hidden.
config.cs.lines.hypixel_powder.desc: Show Hypixel's Powder Line on the scoreboard.
